      User DatabaseUtils.retrieveUserFromId​(long userId, String userName)
      This function retrieves a user with a specific Id from database
      private User DatabaseUtils.retrieveUserFromId​(Long telegramId)
      This function retrieves a user with a specific telegram ID
      User DatabaseUtilsInterface.retrieveUserFromId​(long userId, String userName)
      This function is going to insert a user if said user is not present yet This function will be called by UpdateReceiver whenever an update is received, so it must be somewhat efficient if user not exists, creates it as well.
